context: In his native <a5_0>Poland<a5_0/>, in <a4_0><a8_0>France<a8_0/><a4_0/>, where he composed most of his works, and beyond, Chopin's music, his status as one of music's earliest superstars, his association (if only <a0_0>indirect<a0_0/>) with <a6_0><a9_0>political insurrection<a9_0/><a6_0/>, <a1_0>his love life and his early death<a1_0/> have made him, in the public consciousness, a leading symbol of the <a2_0><a7_0><a10_0>Romantic era<a10_0/><a7_0/><a2_0/>. His works remain popular, and he has been the subject of numerous <a3_0>films and biographies<a3_0/> of varying degrees of historical accuracy.
